Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York and the New York city building code, in relation to greenhouses.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: In relation to greenhouses.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city building code, in relation to sun control devices.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Sun control devices.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York and the New York city building code, in relation to allowing large solar rooftop installations.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Allowing large solar rooftop installations.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city building code, in relation to the installation of rooftop solar panels.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Installation of rooftop solar panels.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the installation of solar power energy systems on building walls and for ground mounted systems.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Installation of solar power energy systems on building walls and for ground mounted systems.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York and the New York city building code, in relation to roof coating standards.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Roof coating standards.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the Administrative Code of the City of New York to require the Department of Buildings to develop and, where appropriate, adopt existing detailed criteria for the installation of vegetated green roofs.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Require the Dept of Buildings to develop and, where appropriate, adopt existing detailed criteria for the installation of vegetated green roofs.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to requiring photovoltaic installations on city-owned buildings.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring photovoltaic installations on city-owned buildings.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to adoption of standards and a protocol that accommodates the installation of wind energy turbines on buildings.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Adoption of standards and a protocol that accommodates the installation of wind energy turbines on buildings.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the City of New York in relation to the installation of city-owned solar hot water systems on city-owned buildings, for privately-owned systems, and to establish a pilot program for owners of private property to install solar hot water systems.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Installation of city-owned solar hot water systems on city-owned buildings.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to fees for the installation of solar power energy systems.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Fees for the installation of solar power energy systems.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to creation of a Solar Map, accessible online, and to establish a Smart Solar program to help residents and businesses pursue the best solar solution for their locale.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creation of a Solar Map, accessible online, and to establish a Smart Solar program to help residents and businesses pursue the best solar solution for their locale.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York and the New York city building code, in relation to combined heat and power systems.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Exempting solar panels from limits on rooftop coverage.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to amend section 499-aaa of the New York State Real Property Tax Law to allow the Green Roof Tax Abatement to extend to owners who produce live food producing plants.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Allow the Green Roof Tax Abatement to extend to owners who produce live food producing plants.

Items.Title: Roll Call

Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to amend section 499-aaa of the New York State Real Property Tax Law to allow the Green Roof Tax Abatement to extend to owners who produce live food producing plants.
Items.ActionName: P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
Items.MatterName: Allow the Green Roof Tax Abatement to extend to owners who produce live food producing plants.
